item.title: How do i post pics.. comes up wrong
item.dc:creator: @T3h_Hate T3h Hate
item.description:
@T3h_Hate wrote:

Does his guide help cause if the Print/Rec button doesn’t work you can always download a
program. I recommend, Snag It 8.0

This is a very good Program where you take screenshots with.
Its only for a 30 day trial without purchasing it. go to

[glow=red,2,300]Snag It 8.0[/glow]

http://www.techsmith.com/snagit.asp

Just put in your email address after and you have to download it.

Just set a button by clicking on the program shortcut and then take a picture it will pop upin an editor mode which you can edit the pics and save them.

I upload mine at

www.imageigloo.com

I only put this cause some people can’t use the Prn/Scrn button

Read full topic

item.title: How do i post pics.. comes up wrong
item.dc:creator: @BamBam BamBam
item.description:
@BamBam wrote:

heres my picture posting guide i made, should help you… this was all made by me! so i take full credit. and yes imageshack is free.

  1. have the runescape showing on the screen

  2. look on your keyboard and press the key thats call Printscreen thats highlighted on the keyboard, diogram below

  1. now, go to your start menu at bottom of the left hand side of your screen

Click it, now after that go to Programs and from there go to
Accessories and let the side menu open, then scroll down to Paint like shown in photo

  1. now paintshop should be opened. go to Edit, and click Paste, should look something like this

Now… after that, save your photo something like yourpicturesname.PNG and upload it

Q. im done with all those steps, now where do i upload my pictures?
A. go to www.imageshack.us and click browse like the picture below

another window will popup asking for the file your want to upload, looks something like this

find your picture names (e.g, yourpicturesname.PNG) and select it

  1. after the photo is uploaded, youll be redirected to other page with your links on it, look at the buttom and youll see “Direct Link To Image” copy it like the picture below shows

  1. now after you got your link, come back to the forums and start your topic, and paste your link down, make sure its highlighted, now use the “IMG” button and it should now look something like this

Congradulations, you just posted a picture.

BamBam-

Read full topic

item.title: How do i post pics.. comes up wrong
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

Go to www.imageshack.us Press browse, Choose your picture file, upload it, go pick the URL most to the Bottom, come back here, type in [img]InsertImageURL[/img] then it will be uploaded.

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]
